mapper.select: SELECT dhw.workflow_id AS mutex_workflow_id, dhw.name AS mutex_workflow_name, dht.name AS mutex_theme, dht.name AS mutex_layer, df.mut_project_name AS mutex_project_name, df.mut_flow_id AS mutex_flow_id, hw.name AS workflow_name, hw.workflow_id AS workflow_id FROM mut_flows df LEFT JOIN hdispatch_workflow dhw ON df.mut_project_name = dhw.name LEFT JOIN hdispatch_workflow hw ON df.project_name = hw.name LEFT JOIN hdispatch_theme dht ON dhw.theme_id = dht.theme_id LEFT JOIN hdispatch_layer dhl ON dhw.layer_id = dhl.layer_id WHERE df.project_name = #{projectName}

SELECT dhw.workflow_id AS mutex_workflow_id, dhw.name AS mutex_workflow_name, dht.name AS mutex_theme, dht.name AS mutex_layer, df.mut_project_name AS mutex_project_name, df.mut_flow_id AS mutex_flow_id, hw.name AS workflow_name, hw.workflow_id AS workflow_id FROM mut_flows df LEFT JOIN hdispatch_workflow dhw ON df.mut_project_name = dhw.name LEFT JOIN hdispatch_workflow hw ON df.project_name = hw.name LEFT JOIN hdispatch_theme dht ON dhw.theme_id = dht.theme_id LEFT JOIN hdispatch_layer dhl ON dhw.layer_id = dhl.layer_id WHERE df.mut_project_name = #{projectName}
